title: For Honor Paragon
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt 
themesetting=a|
darkmode=a]]


[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "SCP FOUNDATION";
     --header-subtitle: "SECURE - COINTAIN - PROTECT";

}
[[/module]]




[[div class="notation"]]
[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[collapsible show="What is this?" hide="Close"]]
Hi, this is my entry for Remixcon 2023, this is my interpretation of the [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/project-paragon-hub PROJECT PARAGON]'s Demons if they were based on different cultures, all was written by [[*user djkaktus]], I was greatly inspired from the game For Honor and thought about remixing these 6 arms dudes right away. I'm gonna save 6765 for later :D
Mentioned SCP: 
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2254 SCP-2254]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4840 SCP-4840]
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6666 SCP-6666]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Afor-honor-paragon/remixed%20paragon.png]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Afor-honor-paragon/4840.png]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Afor-honor-paragon/6666.png]]
[[/div]]
author: Duy Giang
